title: RPC method engine_getPayloadBodiesByHashV1 crashed
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

erigon version 2.54.0

OS & Version: Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS

Erigon Command (with flags/config): --http --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 8545 --http.api trace,eth,net,web3 --http.vhosts=* --maxpeers 30 --private.api.addr  --prune hrtc --prune.h.older 2300000 --prune.r.older 2300000 --prune.t.older 2300000 --prune.c.older 2300000 --authrpc.port 8551

Consensus Layer: prysm

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config): --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551

Chain/Network: mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

No errors

#### Actual behaviour

```
[INFO] [11-16|14:51:34.387] [5/12 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedAccount current_prefix=7ea7fd46
[INFO] [11-16|14:52:04.392] [5/12 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedAccount current_prefix=a91d2f63
[INFO] [11-16|14:52:34.387] [5/12 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedAccount current_prefix=d429adad
[EROR] [11-16|14:52:36.754] RPC method engine_getPayloadBodiesByHashV1 crashed: runtime error: index out of range [0] with length 0
[service.go:219 panic.go:884 panic.go:113 engine_server.go:540 engine_server.go:668 value.go:586 value.go:370 service.go:224 handler.go:493 handler.go:443 handler.go:391 handler.go:222 handler.go:315 asm_amd64.s:1598]
[WARN] [11-16|14:52:36.754] Served                                   conn=127.0.0.1:42990 method=engine_getPayloadBodiesByHashV1 reqid=287 t=250.495Âµs err="method handler crashed"
[INFO] [11-16|14:53:04.387] [5/12 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedAccount current_prefix=fed9cc39
[INFO] [11-16|14:53:05.223] [5/12 HashState] Incremental promotion   from=18582575 to=18584791 codes=false csbucket=StorageChangeSet
[INFO] [11-16|14:53:40.410] [5/12 HashState] ETL [2/2] Loading       into=HashedStorage current_prefix=120f6fde
